name: Ashlesh Sharma
body:
I am a co-founder at [Entrupy](http://www.entrupy.com/). I completed my PhD from [Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences](http://cims.nyu.edu/) at NYU specializing in physical unclonable functions, security and computer vision.

### Research Interests

Physical unclonable functions (PUFs), security, computer vision

### Selected Publications

[Microscopic paper fingerprinting](http://spie.org/x86766.xml)  
Ashlesh Sharma, Lakshminarayanan Subramanian, Eric Brewer.  
SPIE Newsroom in Defense & Security. 


[PaperSpeckle: Microscopic Fingerprinting of Paper](http://dl.acm.org/authorize?6592586)  
Ashlesh Sharma, Lakshminarayanan Subramanian, Eric Brewer.  
ACM Computer and Communication Security (CCS) 2011.

[Hermes: data transmission over unknown voice channels](http://dl.acm.org/authorize?390821)  
Aditya Dhananjay, Ashlesh Sharma, Michael Paik, Jay Chen, Trishank Karthik Kuppusamy, Jinyang Li, Lakshminarayanan Subramanian.   
ACM MOBICOM 2010.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
